name: Depths (ryanmunger)
description:
Keybinds

W -> move up (when on ladder)

A -> move left

S -> move down (when on ladder)

D -> move right

E -> interact

Spacebar -> jump

Click - > shoot

Description

An action platformer where you must defeat the alien hostiles.

Notes

Desktop only.

Special thanks to https://dani-maccari.itch.io/ and https://poloviiinkin.itch.io/ for the assets!
